entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: The house that Harry is a part of. Gryffindor is mentioned as the house that Ron and his siblings are from.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron Weasley, a student at Hogwarts. He is worried about getting in trouble with his mother due to Fred and George leaving Hogwarts.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Not explicitly mentioned as the one who should worry about anyone, but implied as being part of Gryffindor house.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione Granger, a student at Hogwarts. She is trying to reassure Ron that he shouldn't be worried.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Fred and George Weasley, Ron's siblings. They left Hogwarts and are the reason for Ron's worry about getting in trouble with his mother.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Dolores Umbridge, a Ministry of Magic employee who is screening letters to Hogwarts.

entities.name: mum
entities.description: Ron's mother. She sent a Howler to Ron in the past and might send another one if she finds out that Fred and George left Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Ron is worried about getting in trouble with his mother because his siblings, Fred and George, left Hogwarts.
Ron's mother might be angry with him if she finds out that Fred and George left Hogwarts.
